attributes.title: I don’t like it
attributes.review: I just hate that this app has a rapist right when you open it, it makes me uncomfortable.

attributes.title: Level 1 was too scary
attributes.review: Took 8 months to download. Poor graphics. Not worth my time or the 0 dollars I spent on it. Uninstalling.

attributes.title: Gen Z
attributes.review: I know they are trying to remove the app but in all honesty it’s hot trash. Bugs, spam, and other things make this app the worst I have ever used.

attributes.title: Lagged really bad
attributes.review: I got this app to see what ever trump had to say. It was bad. The app lagged and logged out and made my phone spazz out. I would genuinely not get this app even if u do like trump.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. it breaches your phone and information when u download it and it asks for personal information. u will get hacked and they might steal your credit card. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. THE APP STORE NEEDS TO REMOVE THIS

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded it and shortly after my goldfish drowned so i had to flush him down the toilet but in the middle of it my fish un drowned and started talking. i think this app broke my fish. rip mr. shellyshore
Worst app I think I’ve ever downloaded, made everything crash, had really high hopes trump should look into it

attributes.title: DELETE APP
attributes.review: literally the worst app ever.. i don’t even know why i downloaded it, the app store needs to take this down for ever, no one wants to see this cheeto boy anymore 😳

attributes.title: You’re trash
attributes.review: You’re trash , you’re the Cheeto I found behind my dresser covered in dust and dander after finally cleaning my room after 3 months. Idiot.

attributes.title: gave me depression
attributes.review: this app made all my fingers slowly decompose. i am now left with bone let are now falling apart. so you may wonder you is typing this. well it’s my fourteen yr old chihuahua, whose tongue can barely stay in his mouth due to his teeth fall out of his face bc of this app. so now that i have no fingers and my dog has no teeth and am left with depression.
